DOC.brief_summary: To assess food effect on the pharmacokinetics of fimasartan in healthy male volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Assess Food Effect on the Pharmacokinetics of Fimasartan in Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: age: 20 45 years sex: male body weight: greater than 55 kg written informed consent known allergy to Fimasartan existing cardiac or hematological diseases existing hepatic and renal diseases existing gastrointestinal diseases acute or chronic diseases which could affect drug absorption or metabolism history of any serious psychological disorder abnormal diet which could affect drug absorption or metabolism positive drug or alcohol screening smokers of 10 or more cigarettes per day participation in a clinical trial during the last 60 days prior to the start of the study
DOC.keyword: To assess food effect on the pharmacokinetics of fimasartan in healthy male volunteers
